summary: Conversion of GooBoo's "UNPK Black and Gold Robes" for the Demon Fet Body.
descriptionHtml:
I encourage everyone to PLEASE!!! upload your ScreenShots.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/img]
This is a SeveNBase Based Conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52713/?]GooBoo's UNPK Black & Gold Robes[/url] for the Demon Fet Body
The Demon Fet Body is a skinner more well endowed version of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase[/url] BombShell.

it is TBBP-BBP compatible, with Working weight Slider. Make sure you install the proper requirements listed below


[img]https://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/img]
[color=#ff7700]
[b][i][size=4][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/kt4n8a51o8036be/Demon+Fet+Body+%26+-LABIA-.7z]Demon Fet Body[/url][/size][/i][/b] [/color]  by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77163/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77163%26preview%3D&pUp=1]DeMoNhUnTeR1986
[/url]The Body isn't necessarily required but is here for anyone who might want to try this body out.

[color=#ffffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?][b][i][size=4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended -XPMSE-[/size][/i][/b][/url] [/color] By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3350373/?]Groovtama[/url]

If you for any reason have issues with the xp32 skeletons try downloading [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/m6h7o7irdj5pm43/Zquad1%27s+Skeleton+for++Demon+Fet+Body.7z#39;s_Skeleton_for__Demon_Fet_Body.7z]My Skeleton[/url] & you shouldn't have anymore issues.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/img]
These are loose files so you will need to install this manually now you can install through NMM but I don't include the FOMOD file.

so just drop the files into your Skyrim directory. the file path for that is  C:/Programs(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data.
Now Activate the .ESP by clicking on the "SkyrimLauncher.exe" then Exit out of the Launcher & then click on Loot to finish the activation.
if you need Loot Click here---> [url=https://github.com/loot/loot/releases/tag/0.9.1]LOOT
[/url]                                      [img]https://s20.postimg.org/g8llfh1jh/Signature_Final1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/img]
[color=#ff7700][url=http://www.bethsoft.com/]Bethesda[/url][/color][url=http://www.bethsoft.com/age]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/839777/?]GooBoo[/url]
[color=#ff7700][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2113195/?]Asianboy345[/url][/color]

author: GooBoo
